Bibliography¶

[1] Chantler, C. T. Detailed tabulation of atomic form factors, photoelectric absorption and scattering cross section, and mass attenuation coefficients in the vicinity of absorption edges in the soft X-ray (Z=30-36, Z=60-89, E=0.1 keV-10 keV), addressing convergence issues of earlier work. Journal of Physical and Chemical Reference Data 29:597–1048 (2000) http://dx.doi.org/10.1063/1.1321055.
[2] Elam, W. T., Ravel, B. D., Sieber, J. R. A new atomic database for X-ray spectroscopic calculations. Radiation Physics and Chemistry 63:121–128 (2002) http://dx.doi.org/10.1016/S0969-806X(01)00227-4.
[3] Keski-Rahkonen, O., Krause, M. O. Total and partial atomic-level widths. Atomic Data and Nuclear Data Tables 14:139–146 (1974) http://dx.doi.org/10.1016/S0092-640X(74)80020-3.
[4] Waasmaier, D., Kirfel, A. New Analytical Scattering Factor Functions for Free Atoms and Ions. Acta Crystallographica A 51:416–431 (1995) http://dx.doi.org/10.1107/S0108767394013292.
